name: yawningportalsearch
description: An extension to inject search capabilities to a Yawning Portal upcoming events page

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run generate
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/bookmarklet && mkdir dist/chrome && mkdir dist/firefox
scripts.prepare: cp src/search.js dist/work.js && replace-in-file @@VERSION@@ $npm_package_version dist/work.js && replace-in-file @@HOMEPAGE@@ $npm_package_homepage dist/work.js
scripts.generate: npm run prepare && npm run closure && npm run bookmarklet && npm run chrome && npm run firefox
scripts.chrome: cp src/extensions/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/. && cp dist/search.js dist/chrome/search.js
scripts.firefox: cp src/extensions/firefox/manifest.json dist/firefox/. && cp dist/search.js dist/firefox/search.js

author: Greg Ludington
